# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-105">이 문서에는 모든 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의가 나열됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-105">This article lists all sensitive information type entity definitions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-106">각 정의는 DLP 정책이 각 유형을 검색하기 위해 검색하는 것을 보여줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-106">Each definition shows what a DLP policy looks for to detect each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-107">중요한 정보 유형에 대한 자세한 내용은 중요한 정보 [유형을 참조하세요.](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-108">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-109">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-110">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-111">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-112">00-12, 21-32, 61-72 또는 80 범위의 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-113">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-114">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-115">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-116">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-117">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-118">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-119">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-120">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-121">정책은 300자 이내의 접근성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도 중간 정도의 신뢰를 가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-122">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-123">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-124">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-125">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-140">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-140">routing transit number</span></span>

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-143">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-144">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-145">8자리 숫자(또는 기간이 없는 경우)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-146">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-147">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-148">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-149">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-150">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-151">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-152">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-153">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-154">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-155">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-156">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-157">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-158">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-160">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-160">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-161">Argentina National Identity number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-161">Argentina National Identity number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-163">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-163">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-164">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-164">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-165">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-165">documento nacional de identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-166">documento número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-166">documento número</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-169">rnp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-169">rnp</span></span> 
   
## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-170">아르헨티나 고유 세금 식별 키(CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-171">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-172">대시가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-172">11 digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-173">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-174">대시가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-174">11 digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-175">20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 또는 34의 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-176">하이픈(-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-177">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-178">하이픈(-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-179">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-180">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-181">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-182">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-183">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-184">이 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-185">시작 `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-186">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-187">이 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-188">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-188">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_unique_tax_key"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-189">Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-189">Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-190">Clave Unica de Identificacion Tributaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-190">Clave Unica de Identificacion Tributaria</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-191">CUIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-191">CUIT</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-192">고유한 랩 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-192">unique code of labour identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-193">Clave Única de Identificación Tributaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-193">Clave Única de Identificación Tributaria</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-194">고유한 실무 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-194">unique labour identification code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-195">CUIL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-195">CUIL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-196">고유 세금 식별 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-196">Unique Tax Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-197">고유 랩 식별 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-197">Unique Labour Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-198">랩 식별의 고유 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-198">Unique Key of Labour Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-199">고유 작업 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-199">Unique Work Identification Code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-200">고유 작업 ID 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-200">Unique Code of Work Identification</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-226">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-227">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-228">은행 지점 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-228">six to 10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-229">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-230">계정 번호는 6자리에서 10자리까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-231">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-232">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-233">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-234">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-235">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-236">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-237">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-238">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-239">정규식 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-240">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-241">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-242">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-243">정규식 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-244">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-258">full names</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-258">full names</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-260">오스트레일리아 비즈니스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-260">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-261">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-262">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-263">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-264">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-265">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-266">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-267">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-268">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-268">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-269">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-270">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-270">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-271">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-271">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-272">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-272">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-273">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-273">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-274">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-274">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-275">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-275">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-276">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-276">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-277">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-277">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-278">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-279">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-279">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-280">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-281">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-281">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-282">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-282">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-283">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-283">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-284">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-285">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-285">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-295">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-295">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-296">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-296">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-297">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-297">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-298">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-298">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-299">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-299">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-300">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-300">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-301">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-301">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-302">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-303">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-303">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-304">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-305">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-305">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-306">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-306">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-307">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-307">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-308">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-308">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-309">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-309">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-310">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-310">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-311">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-312">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-312">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-313">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-314">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-314">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-315">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-315">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-316">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-316">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-317">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-317">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-318">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-318">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-320">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-320">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-321">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-321">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-322">australia company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-322">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-323">australia company no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-323">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-324">australia company number(오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-324">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-325">australian company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-325">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-326">australian company no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-326">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-327">australian company number(오스트레일리아 회사 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-327">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-328">호주 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-329">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-330">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-332">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-333">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-334">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-335">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-336">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-337">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-338">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-339">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-340">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-341">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-342">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-343">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-344">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-345">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-346">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-347">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-447">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-448">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-449">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-450">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-451">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-452">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-453">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-453">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-454">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-455">11번째 숫자(선택 사항)는 개인 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-456">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-457">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-458">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-459">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-460">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-461">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-462">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-467">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-467">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-468">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-468">bank payments</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-474">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-475">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-476">영문자 8자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-478">한 문자(N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) 다음에 7자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by seven digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-479">두 문자(PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) 다음에 7자리가 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-479">Two letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by seven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-480">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-481">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-482">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-483">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-484">`Regex_australia_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-485">시작 `Keyword_australia_passport_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-486">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-487">`Regex_australia_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-507">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-508">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-509">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-511">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-512">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-513">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-514">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-515">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-516">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-517">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-518">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-519">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-520">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-521">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-522">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-523">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-524">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-524">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-528">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-528">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-529">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-529">portfolio number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-535">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-536">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-537">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-538">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-539">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-540">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-541">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-542">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-543">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-544">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-545">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-672">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-673">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-674">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-675">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-676">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-677">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-678">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-679">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-680">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-681">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-682">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-683">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-684">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-685">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-686">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-687">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-688">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-689">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-690">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-691">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-693">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-694">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-696">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-697">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-698">문자 1개, 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-699">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-700">문자 1자, 숫자 7자 및 공백 1개 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-701">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-702">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-703">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-704">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-705">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-706">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-707">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-708">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-709">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-710">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-711">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-712">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-713">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-723">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-723">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-724">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-724">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-725">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-725">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-726">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-726">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-727">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-727">reisepassnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-728">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-728">reisepasse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-729">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-729">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-730">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-730">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-731">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-731">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-735">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-735">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-736">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-736">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-737">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-738">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-739">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-740">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-741">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-742">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-743">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-744">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-745">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-746">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-747">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-748">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-749">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-750">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-751">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-752">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-753">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-753">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-754">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-754">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-755">austrian ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-755">austrian ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-756">ehic number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-756">ehic number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-757">ehic no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-757">ehic no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-758">insurance code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-758">insurance code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-759">insurancecode #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-759">insurancecode#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-760">insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-760">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-761">insurance no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-761">insurance no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-762">krankenkassennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-762">krankenkassennummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-763">krankenversicherung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-763">krankenversicherung</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-764">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-764">socialsecurityno</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-778">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-779">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-780">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-781">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-782">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-783">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-784">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-785">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-786">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-787">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-788">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-789">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-790">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-791">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-792">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-793">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-794">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-795">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-818">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-819">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-820">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-821">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-822">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-823">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-824">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-825">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-826">11자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-827">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-828">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-829">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-830">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-831">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-832">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-833">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-834">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-835">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-836">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-837">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-838">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-839">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-840">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-841">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-842">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-843">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-844">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-845">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-846">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-855">austrian vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-855">austrian vat</span></span>

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-864">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-865">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-866">문자열 "DocumentDb" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-867">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-868">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-869">3~200자 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-870">기호(>), 등호(=), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-871">대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-872">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-873">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-874">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-876">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-877">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-878">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-879">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-879">Keywords</span></span>
