## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6526">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6526">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6527">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6527">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6528">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6528">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6529">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6529">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6530">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6530">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6531">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6531">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6532">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6532">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6533">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6533">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6534">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6534">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6535">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6535">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6536">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6536">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6537">가족 이름의 처음 세 자석에 해당하는 3개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6537">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6538">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자석에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6538">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6539">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6539">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6540">생년월일 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6540">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6541">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자, 여성의 생년월일에 40자리 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6541">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6542">사람이 태어나는 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국 국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6542">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6543">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6543">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6544">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6545">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6545">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6546">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6547">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6547">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6548">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6548">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6549">시작  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6549">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6550">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6550">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6551">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6551">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6586">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6586">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6587">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6588">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자와 문자 2자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6588">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6589">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6590">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6590">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6591">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6591">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6592">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6592">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6593">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6593">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6594">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6594">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6595">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6595">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6596">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6596">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6597">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6597">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6598">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6598">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6599">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY(예제 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6599">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6600">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6601">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6601">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6602">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6626">이탈리아 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6626">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6627">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6627">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6628">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6628">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6629">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6629">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6630">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6630">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6631">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6631">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6632">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6632">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6633">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6634">선택적 소수점 문자가 있는 13자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6634">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6635">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6636">선택적 delimiters가 있는 13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6636">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6637">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6637">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6638">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6638">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6639">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6639">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6640">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6640">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6641">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6642">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6643">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6644">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6644">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6645">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6645">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6646">검색된 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6646">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6647">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6647">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6648">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6648">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6649">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6649">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6650">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6650">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6653">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6653">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6654">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6654">iva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6655">iva #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6655">iva#</span></span>


## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6656">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6656">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6657">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6658">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6658">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6659">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6660">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6660">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6661">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6661">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6662">bank account branch code:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6662">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6663">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6663">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6664">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6664">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6665">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6665">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6666">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6667">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6667">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6668">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6669">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6669">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6670">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6670">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6671">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6671">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6672">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6672">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6673">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6673">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6674">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6675">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6676">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6676">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6677">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6677">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6724">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6724">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6725">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6726">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6726">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6727">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6728">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6728">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6729">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6730">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6730">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6731">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6732">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6733">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6733">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6734">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6734">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6735">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6735">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6736">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6736">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6737">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6737">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6738">driverslicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6738">driverslicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6739">driver'slicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6739">driver'slicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6740">driverslicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6740">driverslicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6741">driver'slicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6741">driver'slicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6742">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6742">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6743">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6743">dl#</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6772">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6772">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6773">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6773">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6774">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6774">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6775">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6775">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6776">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6776">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6777">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6777">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6778">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6778">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6779">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6780">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6780">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6781">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6782">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6782">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6783">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6783">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6784">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6784">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6785">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6786">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6786">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6787">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6788">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6788">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6789">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6789">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6790">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6790">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6791">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6791">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6792">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6792">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6793">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6793">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6794">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6794">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6795">회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6795">corporate number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6797">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6797">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6798">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6798">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6799">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6799">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6800">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6800">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6801">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6801">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6802">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6802">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6803">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6803">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6804">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6804">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6805">일본 내 번호 - 개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6805">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6806">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6806">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6807">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6807">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6808">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6808">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6809">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6809">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6810">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6810">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6811">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6811">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6812">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6813">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6813">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6814">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6815">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6815">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6816">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6816">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6817">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6817">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6818">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6818">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6819">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6819">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6820">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6820">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6821">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6822">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6823">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6824">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6825">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6825">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6826">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6826">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6827">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6827">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6828">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6828">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6835">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6835">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6836">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6836">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6837">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6837">個人番号カード</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6839">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6839">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6841">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6841">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6842">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6843">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6843">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6844">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6845">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6845">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6846">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6847">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6848">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6849">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6850">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6850">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6851">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6851">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6868">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6868">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6869">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6870">문자 및 숫자 12개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6870">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6871">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6872">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6872">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6873">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6873">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6874">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6874">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6875">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6875">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6876">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6877">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6877">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6878">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6879">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6880">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6880">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6881">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6882">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6882">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6884">거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6884">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6885">거주 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6885">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6886">거주 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6886">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6887">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6887">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6888">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6888">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6889">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6889">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6890">일본 거주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6890">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6891">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6892">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6892">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6893">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6893">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6894">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6894">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6895">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6895">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6896">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6896">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6897">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6898">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6898">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6899">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6899">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6900">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6900">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6901">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6901">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6904">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6904">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6906">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6906">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6907">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6907">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6908">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6908">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6909">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6909">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6911">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6911">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6912">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6912">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6913">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6913">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6914">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6915">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6915">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6916">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6917">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6917">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6918">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6918">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6919">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6919">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6920">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6920">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6921">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6921">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6922">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6923">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6924">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6925">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6926">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6926">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6927">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6927">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6928">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6929">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6929">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6930">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6930">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6947">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6947">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6948">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6948">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6949">厚生年金</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6949">厚生年金</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6950">厚生年金被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6950">厚生年金被保険者整理番号</span></span>


## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6951">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6951">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6952">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6953">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6953">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6954">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6955">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6955">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6956">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6956">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6957">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6957">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6958">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6959">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6959">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6960">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6961">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6961">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6962">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6962">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-6963">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-6963">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7088">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7088">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7089">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7090">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7090">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7091">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7091">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7092">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7092">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7093">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7093">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7094">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7094">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7095">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7096">생년월일(19번째 19번째 10년의 경우 "1", 21세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7096">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7097">4자리 숫자( 임의로 생성)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7097">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7098">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7098">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7099">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7099">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7100">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7100">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7101">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7101">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7102">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7103">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7103">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7104">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7105">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7105">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7106">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7106">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7107">시작  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7107">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7108">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7108">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7109">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7109">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7172">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7172">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7173">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7174">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자와 문자 2자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7174">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7175">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7176">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7176">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7177">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7177">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7178">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7178">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7179">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7180">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7180">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7181">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7182">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7182">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7183">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7183">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7184">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7184">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7185">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7185">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7186">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7187">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7187">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7188">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7188">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7211">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7211">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7212">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7213">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7213">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7214">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7215">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7215">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7216">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7217">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7217">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7218">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7219">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7219">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7220">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7220">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7221">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7221">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7346">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7346">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7347">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7347">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7348">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7348">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7349">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7349">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7350">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7350">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7351">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7351">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7352">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7352">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7353">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7354">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7354">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7355">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7356">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7356">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7357">생년월일과 성별 및 세기에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1-6)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7357">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7358">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7358">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7359">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7359">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7360">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7360">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7361">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7362">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7362">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7364">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7365">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7365">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7366">시작  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7366">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7367">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7367">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7368">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7368">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7403">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7403">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7404">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7405">공백이나 공백이 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7405">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7407">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7407">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7408">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7409">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7409">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7410">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7411">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7412">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7412">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7413">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7414">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7415">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7416">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7416">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7417">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7437">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7437">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7438">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7439">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7439">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7440">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7441">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7441">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7442">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7443">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7443">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7444">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7445">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7446">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7446">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7447">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
