## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7571">룩룩부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7571">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7572">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7573">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7574">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7575">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7576">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7577">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7578">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7579">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7579">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7580">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7581">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7581">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7582">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7582">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7583">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7583">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7584">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7585">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7585">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7586">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7587">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7588">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7588">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7589">시작  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7589">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7590">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7591">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7591">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7614">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7614">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7615">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7616">공백이나 공백이 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7616">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7617">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7618">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7618">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7619">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7620">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7620">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7621">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7622">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7623">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7623">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7624">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7624">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7625">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7625">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7626">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7627">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7627">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7628">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7628">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7660">룩룩부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인이 아닌 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7660">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7661">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7662">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7662">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7664">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7664">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7665">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7666">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7666">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7667">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7667">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7668">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7669">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7669">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7670">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7670">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7671">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7671">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7672">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7672">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7673">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7674">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7674">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7675">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7676">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7676">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7677">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7677">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7678">시작  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7678">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7679">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7679">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7680">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7680">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7720">말레이시아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7720">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7721">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7722">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7722">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7723">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7724">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7724">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7725">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7725">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7726">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7726">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7727">2문자 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7727">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7728">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7728">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7729">3개의 임의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7729">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7730">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7730">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7731">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7732">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7732">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7733">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7734">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7735">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7735">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7736">검색된 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7736">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7737">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7737">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_malaysia_id_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7738">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7738">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7763">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7763">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7764">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7765">지정된 패턴의 2자 및 6자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7765">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7766">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7767">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7767">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7768">2자(숫자 또는 문자, 대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7768">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7769">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7769">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7770">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7770">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7771">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7771">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7772">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7772">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7773">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7774">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7774">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7775">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7776">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7777">`Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7777">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7778">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7778">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7902">몰타 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7902">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7903">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7904">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7905">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7906">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7907">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7908">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7909">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7910">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7910">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7911">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7912">7자리 숫자와 한 글자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7912">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7913">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7913">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7914">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"(대소문자 미정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7914">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7915">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7916">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7916">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7917">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7918">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7918">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7919">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7919">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7920">시작  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7920">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7921">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7922">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7922">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7928">kodiċi 개인 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7928">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7931">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7931">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7932">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7932">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7933">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7933">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7934">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7934">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7936">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7936">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7937">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7937">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7938">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7938">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7939">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7939">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7940">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7941">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7941">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7942">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7943">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7943">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7944">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7945">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7945">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7947">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7948">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7948">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7949">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7950">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7950">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7951">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7952">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7952">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7953">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7953">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7971">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7971">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7972">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7972">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7973">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7973">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7974">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7975">몰타어 국가:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7975">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7976">지정된 패턴의 7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7976">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7977">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7977">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7978">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7978">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7979">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7980">몰타 국가: 7자리 숫자 및 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7980">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7981">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7981">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7982">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7982">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7983">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7983">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7984">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7984">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7985">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7986">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7986">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7987">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7988">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7988">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7989">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7989">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7990">시작  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7990">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7991">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7991">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7992">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7992">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7993">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7993">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-7998">kodiċi 개인 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-7998">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8003">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8003">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier(MBI) 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8026">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8027">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8027">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8028">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8028">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8029">1에서 9 사이의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8029">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8030">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8030">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8031">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8031">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8032">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8032">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8033">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8033">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8034">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8034">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8035">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8035">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8036">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8036">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8037">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8037">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8038">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8038">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8039">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8039">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8040">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8040">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8041">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8041">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8042">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8042">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8043">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8043">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8044">`Regex_mbi_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8044">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8045">시작  `Keyword_mbi_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8045">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8046">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8046">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8047">`Regex_mbi_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8047">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8048">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8048">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8050">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8050">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8051">mbi #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8051">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8052">medicare beneficiary #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8052">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8053">medicare 수급자 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8053">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8054">medicare beneficiary no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8054">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8055">medicare beneficiary number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8055">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8056">medicare beneficiary #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8056">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8057">멕시코 고유의 인구 레지스트리 코드(CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8058">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8059">영문자 18자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8059">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8060">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8060">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8061">4개의 문자(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8061">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8062">유효한 날짜를 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8062">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8063">문자 - H/h 또는 M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8063">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8064">유효한 멕시코 상태 코드를 나타내는 두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8064">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8065">3개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8065">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8066">한 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8066">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8067">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8067">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8068">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8069">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8069">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8070">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8071">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8072">이  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8072">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8073">시작  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8073">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8074">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8074">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8075">이  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8075">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8096">네덜란드 시민 서비스(BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8096">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8097">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8098">선택적 공백을 포함하는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8098">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8099">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8100">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8100">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8101">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8101">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8102">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8102">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8103">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8103">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8104">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8104">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8105">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8105">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8106">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8107">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8107">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8108">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8109">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8110">이 Func_netherlands_bsn 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8110">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8111">검색된 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8111">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8112">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8112">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8136">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8136">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8137">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8138">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8138">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8139">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8140">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8140">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8141">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8142">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8142">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8143">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8144">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8144">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8145">`Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8145">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8146">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8146">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8274">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8274">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8275">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8276">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8276">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8277">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8278">9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8278">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8279">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8280">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8280">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8281">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8282">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8283">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8283">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8284">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8284">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8285">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 검색합니다(예제 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8285">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8286">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8287">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8287">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8288">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8288">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8306">네덜란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8306">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8307">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8307">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8308">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8308">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8309">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8309">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8310">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8310">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8311">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8311">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8312">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8312">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8313">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8314">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8314">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8315">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8316">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8316">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8317">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8318">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8318">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8319">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8320">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8320">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8321">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8321">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8322">시작  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8322">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8323">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8323">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8324">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8324">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8362">네덜란드 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8362">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8363">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8364">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8365">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8366">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8367">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8368">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8369">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8370">영문자 14자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8370">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8371">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8372">14자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8372">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8373">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8373">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8374">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8374">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8375">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8375">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8376">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8376">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8377">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8377">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8378">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8378">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8379">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8379">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8380">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8381">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8382">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8383">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8384">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8384">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8385">검색된 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8385">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8386">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8386">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8387">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8387">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8388">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8388">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8389">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8389">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8390">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8390">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8391">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8391">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8392">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8392">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8393">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8393">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8394">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8394">btw nûmer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8395">btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8395">btw-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8396">뉴질랜드 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8396">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8397">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8397">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8398">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8398">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8399">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8399">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8400">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8400">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8401">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8401">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8402">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8402">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8403">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8404">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8404">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8405">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8406">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8406">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8407">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8407">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8408">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8408">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8409">3-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8409">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8410">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8410">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8411">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8411">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8412">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8412">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8413">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8413">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8414">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8414">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8415">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8416">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8417">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8418">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8418">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8419">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8419">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8420">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8420">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8421">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8421">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8422">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8422">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8423">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8423">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8425">account number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8425">account number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8427">bank_acct_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8427">bank_acct_id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8428">bank_acct_branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8428">bank_acct_branch</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8430">뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8430">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8431">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8432">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8433">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8434">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8434">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8435">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8435">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8436">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8437">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8438">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8438">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8439">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8440">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8440">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8441">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8441">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8442">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8442">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8443">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8444">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8445">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8446">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8446">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8447">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8447">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8448">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8448">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8449">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8449">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-8450">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-8450">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
