## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9528">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9528">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9529">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9529">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9530">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9530">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9531">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9531">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9532">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9532">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9533">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9533">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9534">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9534">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9535">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9536">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9536">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9537">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9538">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9538">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9539">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9539">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9540">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9540">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9541">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9541">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9542">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9543">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9543">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9544">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9545">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9545">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9546">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9546">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9547">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9547">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9564">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9564">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9565">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9566">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9566">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9567">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9568">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9568">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9569">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9570">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9570">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9571">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9572">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9572">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9573">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9573">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9574">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9574">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9575">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9575">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9579">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9579">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9581">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9581">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9582">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9583">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9583">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9584">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9584">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9585">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9585">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9586">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9586">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9587">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9587">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9588">사전순 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9588">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9589">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9590">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9590">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9591">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9592">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9592">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9593">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9593">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9594">검색된 Keyword_singapore_nric 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9594">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9595">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9595">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9596">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9596">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9597">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9597">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9598">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9598">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9609">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9609">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9610">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9611">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9611">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9612">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9613">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9613">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9614">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9614">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9615">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9615">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9616">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9617">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9617">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9618">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9619">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9620">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9620">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9621">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9621">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9747">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9747">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9748">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9748">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9749">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9749">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9750">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9750">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9751">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9751">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9752">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9752">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9753">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9753">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9754">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9755">선택적 백 슬래시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9755">nine or 10 digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9756">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9756">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9757">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9757">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9758">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9758">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9759">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9759">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9760">선택적 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9760">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9761">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9762">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9762">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9763">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9764">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9765">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9765">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9766">시작  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9767">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9768">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9768">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9815">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9815">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9816">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9817">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9817">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9818">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9819">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9819">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9820">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9821">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9821">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9822">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9823">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9823">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9824">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9824">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9825">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9825">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9826">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9826">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9827">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9828">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9828">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9829">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9829">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9849">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9849">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9850">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9850">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9851">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9851">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9852">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9853">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9853">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9854">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9855">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9855">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9856">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9857">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9857">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9858">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9859">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9859">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9860">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9860">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9861">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9861">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9989">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9989">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9990">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9990">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9991">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9991">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9992">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9992">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9993">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9993">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9994">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9994">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9995">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9996">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9996">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9997">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9998">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9998">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-9999">"LLL"이 생년월일의 마지막 3자리에 해당하는 생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-9999">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10000">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10000">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10001">같은 날에 태어나는 사람의 성별과 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10001">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10002">남성의 경우 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10002">000-499 for male and 500-999 for female.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10003">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10003">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10004">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10005">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10005">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10007">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10007">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10008">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10008">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10009">시작  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10010">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10010">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10011">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10011">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10039">솔로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10039">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10040">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10041">공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자를 입력할 때 공백이나 공백이 없는 문자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10041">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10042">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10042">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10043">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10043">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10044">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10044">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10045">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10045">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10046">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10046">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10047">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10048">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10048">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10049">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10050">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10051">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10051">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10052">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10053">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10053">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10054">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10055">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10055">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10056">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10069">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10069">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10070">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10070">številka potnega lista</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10075">številke potnih listov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10075">številke potnih listov</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10076">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10076">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10077">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10077">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10078">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10078">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10079">솔로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10079">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10080">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10080">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10081">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10081">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10082">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10082">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10083">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10083">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10084">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10084">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10085">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10085">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10086">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10087">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10087">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10088">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10088">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10089">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10089">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10090">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10090">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10091">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10091">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10092">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10093">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10093">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10094">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10095">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10095">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10096">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10096">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10097">시작  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10097">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10098">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10099">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10099">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10123">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10123">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10124">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10125">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10125">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10126">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10127">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10127">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10128">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10128">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10129">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10129">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10130">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10130">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10131">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10131">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10132">체크 um 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10132">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10133">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10134">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10135">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10136">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10136">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10137">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10137">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10138">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10138">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10139">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10140">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10140">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10141">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10141">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10145">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10145">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10146">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10147">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10147">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10148">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10149">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10149">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10150">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10150">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10151">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10151">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10152">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10152">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10153">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10153">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10154">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10154">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10155">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10155">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10156">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10157">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10157">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10158">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10159">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10159">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10160">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10160">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10161">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10161">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10162">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10162">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10163">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10163">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10164">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10164">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10165">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10165">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10166">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10166">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10167">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10167">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10168">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10168">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10169">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10169">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10170">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10170">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10171">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10171">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10172">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10172">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10173">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10173">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10174">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10175">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10175">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10177">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10177">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10178">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10178">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10179">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10179">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10180">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10181">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10181">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10182">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10183">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10184">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10184">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10185">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10185">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10186">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10187">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10187">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10321">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10321">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10322">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10322">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10323">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10323">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10324">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10324">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10325">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10325">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10326">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10326">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10327">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10327">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10328">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10329">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10329">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10330">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10331">7자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10331">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10332">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10332">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10333">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10333">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10334">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10335">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10336">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10336">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10337">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10338">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10339">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10339">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10340">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10340">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10341">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10341">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10342">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10342">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10366">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10366">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10367">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10368">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8자 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10368">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10369">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10370">8자 또는 9자 조합의 문자와 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10370">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10371">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10371">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10372">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10372">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10373">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10373">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10374">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10375">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10375">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10376">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10377">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10377">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10378">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10378">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10379">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10379">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10380">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD-MM-YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10380">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10381">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10382">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10382">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10383">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10383">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10393">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10393">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10395">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10395">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10396">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10396">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10397">libreta pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10397">libreta pasaporte</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10412">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10412">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10413">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10414">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10414">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10415">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10416">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10416">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10417">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10417">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10418">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10418">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10419">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10419">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10420">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10420">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10421">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10421">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10422">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10423">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10423">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10424">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10425">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10426">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10426">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10427">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10427">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10428">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10428">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10429">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10430">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10430">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10431">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10431">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10440">스페인 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10440">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10441">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10441">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10442">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10442">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10443">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10443">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10444">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10444">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10445">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10445">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10446">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10446">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10447">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10448">지정된 패턴에서 7-8자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10448">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10450">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10450">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10451">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10451">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10452">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10452">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10453">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10453">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10454">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10454">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10455">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10455">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10456">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10456">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10457">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만의 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10458">대문자 1자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10458">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10459">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10459">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10460">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10460">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10462">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10462">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10463">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10463">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10464">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10464">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10466">"M"을(를) 구분하는 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10466">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10467">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10467">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10468">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10468">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10469">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10470">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10470">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10471">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10472">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10472">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10473">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10473">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10474">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10474">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10475">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10476">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10476">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
