## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10507">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10507">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10508">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10509">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10509">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10510">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10511">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10511">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10512">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10512">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10513">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd"에서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10513">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10514">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10514">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10515">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미코론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10515">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10516">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 인용 부호(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10516">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10517">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10517">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10518">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10519">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10519">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10520">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10521">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10521">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10522">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10522">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10523">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10523">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10524">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10524">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10525">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10525">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10526">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10526">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10528">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10528">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10529">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10529">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10530">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10530">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10531">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10531">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10533">이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10533">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10534">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10534">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10535">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10535">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10536">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10536">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10537">기호(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10537">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10538">대/소문자, 숫자, 추가 문자(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자에 대한 1-200자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10538">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10539">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10539">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10541">이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10541">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10551">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10551">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10552">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10552">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10553">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10553">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10554">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10555">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10555">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10556">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10557">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10557">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10558">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10558">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10559">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10559">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10560">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10560">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10561">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10562">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10563">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10564">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10565">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10565">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10566">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10699">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10699">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10700">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10701">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10701">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10702">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10703">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10703">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10704">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10704">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10705">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10705">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10707">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10707">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10708">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10709">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10710">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10711">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10712">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10712">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10713">키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10713">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10714">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10715">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10716">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10716">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10717">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10717">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10736">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10736">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10737">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10738">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10738">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10739">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10740">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10740">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10741">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10742">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10743">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10744">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10744">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10745">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10745">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10746">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10746">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10747">`Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(01 JAN/JAN 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10747">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10748">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10749">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10749">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10750">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10750">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10786">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10786">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10787">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10787">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10788">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10788">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10789">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10789">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10790">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10790">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10791">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10791">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10792">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10792">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10793">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10794">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10794">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10795">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10796">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10796">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10797">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10797">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10798">더하기 기호 또는 마이너스 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10798">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10799">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 세 자리 숫자입니다. 여기서:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10799">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10800">1990년 전에 발급된 숫자의 경우 7번째와 8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외계인을 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10800">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10801">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성에 대해 홀수로 나타내거나 여성의 경우 조차도 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10801">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10802">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10802">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10803">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10804">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10804">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10805">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10806">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10807">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10807">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10808">시작  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10808">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10809">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10810">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10810">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10836">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10836">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10837">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10838">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10838">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10839">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10840">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10840">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10841">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10841">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10842">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10842">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10843">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10843">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10844">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10844">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10845">1~3자리 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10845">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10846">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10847">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10848">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10849">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10850">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10850">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10851">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10851">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10888">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10888">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10889">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10890">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10891">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10892">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10893">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10894">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10895">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10896">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10896">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10897">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10898">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10898">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10899">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10899">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10900">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10900">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10901">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10901">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10902">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10902">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10903">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10903">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10904">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10904">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10905">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10905">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10906">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10907">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10907">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10908">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10909">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10909">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10910">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10910">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10911">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10911">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10912">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10913">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10913">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10934">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10935">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10936">1개의 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10936">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10937">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10938">한 문자(영어) 다음에 9자리 숫자를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10938">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10939">한 글자(영어로, 대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10939">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10940">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10940">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10941">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10941">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10942">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10943">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10944">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10945">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10946">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10946">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10947">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10947">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10948">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10949">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10950">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10950">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10951">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10953">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10953">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10954">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10954">身份證字號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10956">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10956">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10957">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10957">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10960">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10960">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10961">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10961">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10962">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10962">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10963">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10963">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10964">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10964">簽名</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10967">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10967">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10968">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10968">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10969">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10969">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10970">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10970">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10971">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10971">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10972">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10972">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10973">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10973">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10974">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10974">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10975">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10975">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10976">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10976">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10977">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10977">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10978">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10979">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10980">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10981">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10982">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10982">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10983">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10983">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10984">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10984">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10985">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10985">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10986">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10986">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10987">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10987">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10988">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10988">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10989">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10989">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10990">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10990">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10991">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10991">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10992">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10992">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10993">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10993">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10994">대만 거주 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10994">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10995">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10996">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10996">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10997">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10998">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10998">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-10999">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-10999">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11000">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11000">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11001">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11002">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11002">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11003">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11004">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11005">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11005">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11006">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11006">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11007">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11007">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11008">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11008">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11009">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11009">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11010">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11010">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11011">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11011">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11012">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11012">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11013">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11013">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11014">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11014">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11015">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11015">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11016">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11016">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11017">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11017">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11018">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11018">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11019">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11019">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11020">태국어 인구 ID 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11020">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11021">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11022">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11022">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11023">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11024">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11024">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11025">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11025">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11026">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11026">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11027">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11028">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11029">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11030">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11030">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11031">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11031">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11032">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11032">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11033">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11033">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11034">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11034">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11035">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11035">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11036">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11036">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11043">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11043">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11044">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11045">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11045">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11046">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11047">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11047">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11048">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11049">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11049">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11050">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11051">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11051">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11052">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11052">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11053">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11053">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11054">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11055">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11055">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11056">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11056">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11058">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11058">TC Kimlik No</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11060">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11060">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11061">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11061">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11062">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11062">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11063">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11063">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11064">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11065">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11065">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11066">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11067">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11067">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11068">5개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11068">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11069">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11069">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11070">생년월일의 날짜 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11070">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11071">드라이버가 여성인 경우 일곱 번째 문자가 50으로 증가합니다. 시험의 경우 01에서 12까지가 아니라 51에서 62까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11071">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11072">대소문자 2개(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11072">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11073">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11073">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11074">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11075">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11076">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11077">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11077">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11078">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11078">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11079">시작 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11079">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11080">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11081">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11081">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11082">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11082">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11083">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11204">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11204">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11205">선택 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11205">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11206">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11207">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11207">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11208">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11209">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11209">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11210">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11210">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11211">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11211">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11212">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11212">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11213">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11214">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11214">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11215">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11215">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11216">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11216">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11218">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11218">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11219">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11219">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11220">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11220">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11221">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11221">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11222">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11222">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11223">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11223">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11224">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11225">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11225">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11226">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11227">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11227">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11228">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11228">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11229">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11229">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11230">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11230">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11231">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11231">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11232">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11232">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11233">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11234">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11235">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11236">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11237">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11237">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11238">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11239">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11240">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11240">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11241">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11241">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11242">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11260">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11260">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11262">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11263">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로도 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11263">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11264">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11265">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11265">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11266">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11267">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11267">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11268">두 문자(유효한 NINOS는 이 연결의 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자는 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11268">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11269">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11269">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11270">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다. 대소문자 구분 안 ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11270">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11271">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11272">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11272">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11273">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11273">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11274">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11274">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11275">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11275">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11276">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11276">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11277">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11277">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11278">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11278">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11279">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11279">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11280">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11280">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11281">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11282">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11282">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11283">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11284">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11285">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11285">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11286">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11286">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11287">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11287">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11288">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11288">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11310">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11310">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11311">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11311">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11312">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11312">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11313">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11313">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11314">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11314">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11315">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11315">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11316">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11316">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11317">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11317">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11318">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11319">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11319">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11320">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11321">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11321">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11322">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11323">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11323">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11324">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11325">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11326">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11326">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11327">시작  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11327">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11347">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11347">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11348">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11349">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11349">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11350">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11351">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11351">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11352">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11353">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11354">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11355">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11356">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11356">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11357">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11357">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
