## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11387">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11387">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11388">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11389">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11389">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11390">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11391">주에 따라 다를 수 있습니다. 예: 뉴욕:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11391">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11392">ddd ddd ddd와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11392">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11393">dddddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11393">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11394">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11395">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11396">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11397">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11398">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11398">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11399">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11399">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11400">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11400">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11401">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11402">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11402">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11403">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11403">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11404">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11404">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11405">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11405">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11496">id card#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11496">id card#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11497">id cards#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11497">id cards#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11498">identification card#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11498">identification card#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11499">identification cards#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11499">identification cards#</span></span> 


#### <a name="keyword_state_name_drivers_license_name"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11500">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11500">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11501">상태 약어(예: "NY")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11501">state abbreviation (for example, "NY")</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11502">상태 이름(예: "New York")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11502">state name (for example, "New York")</span></span>

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11503">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11503">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11504">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11505">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자이며 선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식이 지정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11505">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11506">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11507">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11507">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11508">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11508">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11509">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11509">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11510">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11510">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11511">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11511">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11512">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11512">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11513">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11513">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11514">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11514">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11515">unformatted:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11515">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11516">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11516">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11517">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11517">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11518">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11518">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11519">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11519">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11520">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11521">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11522">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11523">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11523">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11524">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11524">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11525">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11525">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11526">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11527">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11527">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11528">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11528">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11529">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11530">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11530">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11531">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11532">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11532">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11533">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11533">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11534">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11534">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11535">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11535">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11536">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11536">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11537">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11537">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11538">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11538">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11539">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11539">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11540">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11540">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11541">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11541">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11542">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11542">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11543">에 대한 나타</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11543">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11544">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11544">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11545">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11545">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11546">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11547">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11547">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11548">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강력합니다. 이 서식은 숫자의 특정 부분이 특정 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11548">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11549">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11550">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 찾아보세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11550">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11551">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년보다 강력한 서식이 있는 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11551">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로 서식이 지정되지 않은 강력한 2011 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 공백(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd d)으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로폼이 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11555">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11556">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11556">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11557">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11558">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11559">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11559">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11560">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11560">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11561">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11562">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11562">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11563">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11563">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11564">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11564">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11565">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11565">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11566">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11566">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11567">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11567">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11568">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11568">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11569">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11569">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11570">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11570">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11571">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11571">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11572">SSA 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11572">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11573">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11573">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11574">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11574">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11575">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11575">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11576">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11576">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11577">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11577">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11578">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11578">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11579">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11579">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11580">SSNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11580">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11581">SSN #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11581">SSN#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11582">SS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11582">SS#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11583">SSID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11583">SSID</span></span>
   
## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11584">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11584">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11585">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11585">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11586">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11587">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11588">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11589">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11589">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11590">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11591">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11592">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11593">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11593">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11594">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11594">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11595">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11595">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11596">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11596">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11597">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11597">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11598">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11598">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11599">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11599">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11615">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11615">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11616">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11616">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11617">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11617">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11618">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11618">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11619">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11619">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11620">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11620">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11621">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11621">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11622">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11623">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11623">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11624">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11625">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11625">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11626">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11627">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11628">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11629">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11630">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11630">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11631">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11631">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11640">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11640">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11641">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11641">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11642">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11642">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11643">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11643">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11644">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11644">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11645">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11645">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11646">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11646">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11647">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11648">8자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11648">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11649">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11650">8자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11650">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11651">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11651">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11652">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11652">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11653">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11654">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11654">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11655">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11656">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11656">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11657">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11657">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11658">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11658">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11659">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11659">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11660">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11660">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11661">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11661">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11662">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11662">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11663">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11663">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11664">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11664">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07fa1-11665">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07fa1-11665">номер паспорта</span></span>
